      • collision

        public boolean collision​(double otherX,
                         double otherY,
                         double otherWidth,
                         double otherHeight)
        Collision method to detect if this object collides with another.
        Parameters:
        otherX - A double representing another items X value.
        otherY - A double representing another items Y value.
        otherWidth - A double representing another items width value.
        otherHeight - A double representing another items height value.
        Returns:
        Returns true if it collides, else it's false.

      • move

        public void move​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> input)
        Method to update x and y position of Monkey, and display onto screen based off WASD input.
        Parameters:
        input - An arraylist of strings that contain user input, depending on the input the Monkey will move.
